overview: The action explodes in Time Cops with five hardcore scenes, six revolvers, four horses, three shootouts, a cop car and a time machine. This is the most ambitious gay adult video ever undertaken by Centaur, and most likely, any other company. Starring Centaur's exclusive top Brock 11" Masters in his on-camera debut and super-top 10" Zachary Scott, along with nine of the hottest men on the planet.
tagline: Cops, Cowboys and Criminals ride each other long and hard as studly Officer Bob Ford goes back to the Old West to battle the treacherous James brothers and prevent his brother Zach from dying again!
title: Time Cops
